channel.title: Help making my interface pop-up when i log in?!?!?
channel.description:
Hi I made a welcome screen and added the interface and everything now i just want to get it so when they log in it stays up I got part of it so when u log in it pops up but then disapeers quikly :( plz fix? I added this under my welcome text in client.java... getPA().walkableInterface(14060);
is there anything else i need to add to make it stay up instead of disapeer instantly? I am using PI (project insanity)!
